entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Savant Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 PM CDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -19.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sioux Lookout Airport 02:00 AM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -19.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -23.7°C
Wind: E 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:47 PM CDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:47 PM CDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:47 PM CDT Monday 20 March 2023
